title: Scaffolding answer explanation in a data normalization tutor
authors: A Mitrović - Facta universitatis-series: Electronics and Energetics
excerpt: Self-explanation is one of the most effective learning strategies, resulting in deep knowledge. In this paper, we discuss how NORMIT supports self-explanation. NORMIT is a constraint-based tutor that teaches data normalization. We present the system first, and  ...
